title: Why is adventure, which is risky, also pleasurable? - Quora

response.answer_text: I think the answer lies deep within each of us and usually doesn’t change during our lives. Very early, each of us comes to a fork in our lives where either a fundamental fearfulness takes us down one fork or the thrill of adventure takes us down the other fork. Early experiences seem to settle the question and that ‘fork’ becomes our default response as we go through life.
